entities.name: lockhart
entities.description: Professor Lockhart is a wizard who is known for being famous for his books about himself.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron Weasley is one of Harry's best friends.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione Granger is one of Harry's best friends.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry Potter is the main protagonist of the story.

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: Gryffindor is one of the four houses at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

entities.name: slytherin
entities.description: Slytherin is one of the four houses at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

relationships.description: Lockhart offered to help Harry with his Quidditch skills.
Lockhart is associated with Gryffindor house as he mentioned the first Quidditch match of the season between Gryffindor and Slytherin.
Lockhart is associated with Slytherin house as he mentioned the first Quidditch match of the season between Gryffindor and Slytherin.
